awards:
第25届俄罗斯尼卡奖(2012)
　　最佳影片(独联体和波罗的海国家)(提名)

writer.name: 苏列夫·基德斯 Sulev Keedus

director.name: 苏列夫·基德斯 Sulev Keedus

introduction: JJK, Jeremias Juunas Kirotaja has been taken with Soviet Army to the Afghan War where he escapes to join the Muslim troops. Having lived as a Muslim for 15 years, he returns home to Estonia. Everything has changed since the Soviet rule in his absence. Money has changed everything. Even the letters JJK wrote to his daughter have been sold and published as a best-selling book. JJK retreats to the solitary countryside for his father's funeral but even the moor has been sold to Nato for military training exercises. JJK can't find his fatherland anymore and he decides to do what a good Muslim must do.
